name: Equatower
description: Welcome to a Nasqueron infrastructure server. This machine provides PaaS facilities, based on Docker.
If you're lost, you're maybe seeking one of our container (ie one of our hosted applications, sites). We maintain such a list on the Nasqueron agora.

In The Algebraist, Equatower is “a thin stipple of red climbing in the sky, sometimes perversely clearer above when the lower atmosphere was hazed and the higher beacons shone down at a steeper angle through less air”.

extraFooterSections.content: If you install a service usable for each PaaS user, add it here.
